messages_events_Language: lang rus` - Choosing a language for the Bot: `(rus|eng)`
messages_events_Language_Reset: lang reset` - Reset the language to: `ENG`
messages_events_Game_Language: game rus` - Saves for all games: `(rus|eng)`
messages_events_Send_Private_Message: I sent you a private message
messages_events_Failed_To_Send_Message: Failed to send message. Maybe I'm on your blacklist!
prefix_change_Must_have_Permission: You cannot change the prefix. You must have permission: `MANAGE SERVER`
language_change_Not_Admin: You are not Admin or you can't managed server
giveaway_registry_Error:
The giveaway was canceled because the bot was unable to get the ID
your post for editing. Please try again. **Write us what exactly happened.
We are trying to fix this bug. Support guild:** https://discord.gg/UrWG3R683d
Game_Start:
Send one letter at a time
 to the chat **without** `{0}`. Latin alphabet
Game_You_Use_This_Letter: You have already used this letter!
Game_Stop_Win: The game is over, you have won!
Hangman_Listener_You_Play:
You're playing now.
You need to send one letter to the chat.
To end the game, write: {0} stop
Hangman_Listener_Need_Set_Language:
First you need to set the language for the words.
Write `{0}game rus` or `!game eng` to set the language.
Then re-write `{0}hg`
MessageStats_Zero_Divide: You have '0' games, and we are not crazy!
ReactionsButton_When_Play: During the game, you can not change the language or start a new game without completing the active one.
